title: Reuters reveals Iran racing to expand enrichment at underground plant, IAEA report shows
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively revealed that Iran is rapidly expanding its ability to enrich uranium with advanced centrifuges at its underground plant […]

The post Reuters reveals Iran racing to expand enrichment at underground plant, IAEA report shows appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed that Iran is rapidly expanding its ability to enrich uranium with advanced centrifuges at its underground plant at Natanz and now intends to go further than previously planned, a confidential U.N. nuclear watchdog report seen by Reuters showed.Â 

The post Reuters reveals Iran racing to expand enrichment at underground plant, IAEA report shows appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
